item.title: BUCS Cup Semi-Finals for ICSM Netball!
item.author: Lindsay Hennah,
item.description: After winning the BUCS South-Eastern conferencecup 2 years ago and losing out last year to the dubious ways of Royal Holloway, this year’s semi-final against Brighton 2s (away) had a lot riding on it. The journey to the idyllic retirement village of Eastbourne where Brighton students reside was …

item.title: Medics Netball round up season with gold medal
item.author: Lindsay Hennah,
item.description: With all the excitement of Varsity out the way, with the BUCS season finished, and with no fixtures left until October, it’s about time that Medics Netball had some of the limelight. Netball is one of those sports that lots of boys claim not to like, mostly because they don’t understand it. Despite …
